title: [Atrium, Balcony]
description: Sunlight streams through the glass panes set into the roof overhead, providing ample light for an excellent view of the area below.  A white stone balustrade edges the balcony, a few small potted palms placed at regular intervals along it.  A marble arch opens into a long hallway.

Moonlight streams through the glass panes set into the roof overhead, providing ample light for an excellent view of the area below.  A white stone balustrade edges the balcony, a few small potted palms placed at regular intervals along it.  A marble arch opens into a long hallway.
